snippet: When he’s not busy opening lower Manhattan hot spots (Lafayette, The Dutch, Locanda Verde), Luke Ostrom enjoys cooking in his spare, stylish Greene Street bachelor pad.
abstract: When he’s not busy opening lower Manhattan hot spots (Lafayette, The Dutch, Locanda Verde), Luke Ostrom enjoys cooking in his spare, stylish Greene Street bachelor pad.

headline.main: The SoHo Digs of the Restaurateur Luke Ostrom
